job.title: C#, Desktop App
job.description:
Expertise in C#, .NET 8, Entity Framework, and SQL.

Develop a module for a stock market analysis application focusing on 1-minute interval bar analysis for trend reversal detection (both long and short positions).

Require a developer with experience in financial data analysis and not dependent on pre-made GitHub solutions.

Implement symbol monitoring using web sockets with the Alpaca Markets API to collect bar data in real-time at a one-minute interval.

The application should intelligently alert the user on optimal entry and exit points for both long and short positions in the stock market.

Display reversal information in a grid view or a message box, as preferred.

Familiarity with chart types similar to provided examples (links to example charts):

https://prnt.sc/8fz7rvWCdjSc
https://prnt.sc/-XaUyvTz7hrV
https://prnt.sc/fdrukVuSCA8e
https://prnt.sc/uDtzl5c-yDcs
https://prnt.sc/xpPmxHB9kRGV
https://prnt.sc/WC23bMNPp_83

Potential future development includes implementing algorithmic trading using the Alpaca Markets API.

Must have proven experience and capability to work on the project without needing a learning phase.

Applicants must detail relevant past projects, particularly in algorithmic trading, and evaluate the probability of success for this application.

questions.question: Can you describe a project where you successfully implemented the Entity Framework-based trading app in C#? What were the key challenges, and how did you address them?
Explain a time when you identified and resolved a trend reversal in financial data. What methods or algorithms did you use, and how did you ensure accuracy and efficiency?
Describe your experience with algorithmic trading, explicitly mentioning any projects where you've integrated and used APIs like Alpaca Markets API. What was your role, and what were the outcomes?

customFields.generatedDescriptionAI:
We are looking for a skilled C# developer to create a desktop application. The project duration is less than 1 month. The ideal candidate should have experience in .NET Framework, Microsoft Windows, Windows App Development, Microsoft Azure SQL Database, Desktop Application, C#, and Microsoft Azure.

As a candidate, we would like you to submit a proposal outlining how you can contribute to the project. Please describe your relevant experience, including any past projects or applications you have developed using C#. We would appreciate it if you could provide links to these projects so we can review them.

Your proposal should highlight your skills in C# programming and demonstrate your ability to develop efficient and user-friendly desktop applications. Additionally, any experience with Microsoft Azure or database integration would be highly valued. We look forward to reviewing your proposal and discussing the project further.
customFields.finalDescriptionAI: I'm seeking a skilled C# developer with expertise in .NET Framework 8, Entity Framework, and SQL to assist in completing a module for a stock market analysis application I'm developing. The project involves analyzing 1-minute interval bars to identify trend reversals. I need a developer with experience in this area and won't rely on pre-made solutions from GitHub. When applying, please describe your relevant past projects and assess the likelihood of success for the app, mainly if it involves algorithmic trading. Future work may include implementing algo trading using the Alpaca Markets API. Candidates must have proven experience and the ability to develop this project without a learning curve.
